strings.s: <size="30">CHAPTER VI</size>\n\nTHE 'LAST' REVELATION
SIX DAYS OF TRAVEL LATER...
Jesus Christ... Finally... Talk about a shitty ride...
Yeah... I remember the way here weren't so nice during my first visit...
But this time the flight make me especially nauseous...
Really!? Like... uuuhhh... morning sickness?
What!? No... Of course not... I... I just felt sick... in... the morning...
Well... I thought I had already gone on uncomfortable trips in the past... But this one was the absolute champion...
I... I'm very sorry,
You're here because of me... It's all my fault...
You bet your ass it is... But I'll find a way for you to repay me...
Yes,
Come on, you grumpy... It's exciting to be finally here, isn't?
I never tought one day I would be in a place like this with you...
Well... I'd rather be with you in a much more comfortable location... But it's okay...
Aaaww... I'll promise we'll be home soon...
Stop complaining,
This place is amazing!! I loved every single moment I spent here last time...
Sure... I bet you loved much more the... experiences and 'people' you met here than the place itself...
Thee hee... I can't deny I have some hot memories of that visit...
Stop complaining, We are very close now...
If we do this right, soon we'll be at home again...
The we'd better not screw up this mission...
Don't worry... We won't!
Yeah... But I'm still not sure if this was a good idea...
Those armed dudes are certainly keeping their positions around the village...
... and they won't be happy knowing you're back to mess with their business...
Hummm... Actually I think some of them will be very happy when they see me again...
Indeed... But they won't like the fact you brought male company this time...
Oh... Yeeeaahh... Those boys can be quite possessive about me, don't you think?
Sigh... Control yourself for a minute, You dragged me here... We'll need a plan so we can both get into that cave...
Oh no... Oh no... Oh no... What... What now... I shouldn't have come back here... They will hurt me...
Hey... Pull yourself together... We didn't even started our first setp for God's sake...
I'm sorry, I'm so sorry... I don't know what to do...
Damn, you're really useless ain't you? I'll have to come up with a plan...
Damn... I almost forgot about them...
They'll certainly become more agressive if they notice you started bringing your own people here...
I agree... We need a plan to infiltrate the village in a secure way...
A plan...
Damn... I almost forgot about them...
They'll certainly become more agressive if they notice you started bringing your own people here...
I agree... We need a plan to infiltrate the village in a secure way...
A plan...
........... Bye, bye, mister pilot... Tee hee...
Sigh... _I think I created a monster..._
Oh no... The transport is leaving... Please make it come back,
Sigh... Too late... Looks like we'll be visiting those friends of yours...
Thank God the transport is leaving... I'm definetively not eager to hop into that damned helicopter again...
Yeah... Neither do I...
Thank God the transport is leaving... I'm definetively not eager to hop into that damned helicopter again...
Yeah... Neither do I...
Well... Our ride just left, so we won't have any choice but come up with some idea to get into the village
Listen... Now that all that noise went away I believe I can hear at least two of them at the gates...
If we approach them together they might get really nervous... We need to decide how to approach the problem and who'll go there first...
At least two? I volunteer to go meet them...
Please, Don't make me go there by myself... I don't know if I can deal with them...
Just check this out... Two goons... Two guns... I liked this style and the Math is precise...
Just check this out... Two goons... Two guns... I liked this style and the Math is precise...
WILL DEAL WITH THEM
WILL DEAL WITH THEM
AND WILL DEAL WITH THEM
ROMANCING
NOT ROMANCING
I got this... You already risked yourself too many times during this adventure,
Aaawww... Thank you, Just be careful, okay?
So... Do you think you can use these toys to handle the bad guys,
Yes... I've been waiting for an opportunity to try some dual wielding firing style...
Go get'em tigress...
So... Do you think you can handle them,
Don't you know my talents already? Of course I can...
Yeah... If you don't mind, then go on...
This is your responsibility, You'll have to get by on your own...
But... But they will... please, not me...
Stop whining... You're going to do this...
TAKE HER GUNS
Hey... Who the hell allowed you to bring guns? You can just drop them here...
But, I could use them to...
Are you nuts!? An airhead like you using guns might end up accidentally killing yourself and put everyone else in danger...
Oh... Maybe... Maybe you're right, I... I'll leave them here...
Good girl... Go now... I'm sure you can figure a way to get us into the village
Yay!!! I know exactly how I can convince those boys let us into the village...
I'm pretty sure you know... Just don't take too much time, for God's sake...
Tee hee... If there are two of them then it may take just a little while...
See you later....
LET HER KEEP THE GUNS
Come on... I trust you... I'm sure you can figure a way to get us into the village...
TAKE HER AMMO CLIPS
Do you think I'm going to let you strut around carrying these loaded pieces?
It's going to be dangerous for me and yourself...
But, It's everything I have to protect myself and...
Sigh... Okay... Keep the guns but give me the ammo clips...
You'll still have one bullet on each chamber... You'd be dead if you'd need more than that anyways...
Thank you, I guess...
Good girl... Go now... I'm sure you can figure a way to get us into the village

I'm telling you, man... Larry just laid her over the tavern table and banged that bitch hard...

TRY TO DRAW PISTOLS
GIVE THEM THE PISTOLS

Here... Take these... I... I don't want to get in any trouble...

But we'll let you off the hook since you were a good girl and gave them to us...

So... I think we can all relief a bit of our stress and then let you in the village... What do you think?
relief... stress...
